original_text: Abraham took seven female lambs from the sheep. He put them in a different place from the other animals.
korean_text: 아브라함이 일곱 암양 새끼를 따로 놓으니

sentences.original_text: Abraham took seven female lambs from the sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 아브라함이 양들 중에서 암 양 일곱 마리를 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: He put them in a different place from the other animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 짐승들과 다른 곳에 그것들을 두었습니다
